LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelPipe.label: astrofuel pipe
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelPipe.description: A large pipe for transporting high-grade astrofuel around. Unlike other pipes, it’s big, bulky, acts as cover and can’t be stood on. Astrofuel pipes can’t be placed on workbench interaction spots and in doorways.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelPipe_Blueprint.label: astrofuel pipe (blueprint)
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelPipe_Frame.label: astrofuel pipe (building)
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelPipe_Frame.description: A large pipe for transporting high-grade astrofuel around. Unlike other pipes, it’s big, bulky, acts as cover and can’t be stood on. Astrofuel pipes can’t be placed on workbench interaction spots and in doorways.
LanguageData.VGE_HiddenAstrofuelPipe.label: hidden astrofuel pipe
LanguageData.VGE_HiddenAstrofuelPipe.description: A hidden, reinforced tube for moving oxygen around. While it’s not visible, it is much more expensive to construct.
LanguageData.VGE_HiddenAstrofuelPipe_Blueprint.label: hidden astrofuel pipe (blueprint)
LanguageData.VGE_HiddenAstrofuelPipe_Frame.label: hidden astrofuel pipe (building)
LanguageData.VGE_HiddenAstrofuelPipe_Frame.descriptio: A hidden, reinforced tube for moving oxygen around. While it’s not visible, it is much more expensive to construct.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelValve.label: astrofuel valve
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelValve.description: Switches astrofuel flow on and off.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelValve_Blueprint.label: astrofuel valve (blueprint)
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelValve_Frame.label: astrofuel valve (building)
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelValve_Frame.description: Switches astrofuel flow on and off.
LanguageData.VGE_GiantAstrofuelTank.label: giant astrofuel tank
LanguageData.VGE_GiantAstrofuelTank.description: A monumental astrofuel storage tank that supplies fuel for thrusters on a gravship.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelTap.label: astrofuel tap
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelTap.description: A hopper-like storage device meant to hold dispensed astrofuel for use later.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelDrain.label: astrofuel drain
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelDrain.description: A hopper-like storage structure meant to input astrofuel into the network, filling up connected tanks.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelGenerator.label: astrofuel generator
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming astrofuel. Much more efficient than chemfuel generators.
LanguageData.VGE_IndustrialAstrofuelGenerator.label: industrial astrofuel generator
LanguageData.VGE_IndustrialAstrofuelGenerator.descrip: Produces a large amount of power by consuming astrofuel. Much more efficient than chemfuel generators.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelSynthesizer.label: astrofuel synthesizer
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelSynthesizer.description: A specialized structure that refines chemfuel into high-grade astrofuel. It must be connected to the astrofuel pipe network and linked to at least one astrofuel tank to operate. Once connected, it automatically converts inserted chemfuel into astrofuel for use in engines and systems.
LanguageData.VGE_Astropurifier.label: astropurifier
LanguageData.VGE_Astropurifier.description: A gravtech unit that enhances the precision and stability of astrofuel refinement. When placed next to an astrofuel synthesizer, it enables perfect 1:1 conversion from chemfuel to astrofuel, though the process takes twice as long.
LanguageData.VGE_GiantThruster.label: giant thruster
LanguageData.VGE_GiantThruster.description:
A massive, reinforced astrofuel thruster built with advanced alloys and ultra-dense vacstone plating. It massively increases the range and maximum size of the gravship. Thrusters require an unobstructed area free of large buildings and gravship substructure.

Requires vacstone blocks, which can be obtained from orbital asteroids.

A gravship can support up to four giant thrusters.
